headline: Will Record EPS, Rising Charge-Offs, and a Higher Dividend Change M&T Bank's (MTB) Narrative?
summary: M&T Bank Corporation has already reported its fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, with net charge-offs rising to US$185 million while net interest income reached US$6.95 billion and net income US$2.85 billion, lifting basic EPS from continuing operations to US$17.10. The bank paired these record earnings with a higher dividend, share repurchases, and guidance pointing to loan growth and disciplined cost control, underlining management’s confidence in its capital position despite...
